Name: Zold:out
About the game: In an unknown weapon store in Ozin Port, the meeting between a merchant and a weaponsmith, starts the story. Zold:out is a semi-turn-based tactical RPG fused with card games and deck building. Four weapon classes with their own unique set of weapon cards, a variety of tactical experiences have been derived. The core system of the game is action bar and card consumption. Every action point spent by a character's action will affect the duration of subsequent rounds. Use up all action points to burst out huge damage, or save action points to roam flexibly, the battle style is controlled by you. Deck building is one of the main system in the game. There are more than 200 weapon cards with unique power in the weapon store to craft you own deck. With different cards paired with different characters, explore the power of creativity in you hand! Tactical RPG doesn't mean to be run on big squares, but devise strategies on a 360-degree seamless battlefield. No longer limited by the big squares in battlefield, use meticulous tactics to defeat powerful enemies. Unique bosses and monsters are made by the development team with countless efforts. You can't easily beat bosses by simply leveling-up your status, adjust tactics and teams according to the characteristics of each boss, and find your own way to break through the difficulties.
